description: This file defines the main UI composable functions for the app's home screen using Jetpack Compose. It includes a featured banner with backdrop and call-to-action, and several horizontally scrolling sections with media items. It leverages navigation and sample data repositories for content.

methods.name: HomeScreen
methods.description: Main composable that displays the home screen layout with a featured banner and multiple media sections.

methods.name: FeaturedBanner
methods.description: Displays a prominent banner with background, overlay, media details, and a 'Play Now' button.

methods.name: SectionRow
methods.description: Renders a titled row with a LazyRow of media poster cards, with animated fade-in.
